sentences: The revised negotiating text contains a chapter on Enhanced action on development and transfer of technologies.
The chapter is 36 pages long, and contains various structural proposals on its organization, as well as proposals for section headings.

The headings as they currently stand, some of which contain brackets, include: objectives, scope and guiding principles; promoting policies on cooperation between developed and developing countries on technology research, development, diffusion and transfer; and institutional arrangements, including funds.
A section on capacity building is also included.
